paper_abstract: Let G be a planar graph with maximum degree Delta(G). We use chi(l)'(G) and chi(l)''(G) to denote the list edge chromatic number and list total chromatic number of G. respectively. In this paper, it is proved that chi(l)'(G) = Delta(G) and chi(l)''(G) = Delta(G)+ 1 if Delta(G) >= 6 and G has neither C-4 nor C-6. or Delta(G) >= 7 and G has neither C-5 nor C-6, where C-k is a cycle of length k. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: List edge and list total colorings of planar graphs without short cycles
